text: Gillian Howard Welch (born October 2, 1967 in New York City) is an American singer-songwriter. Her musical style combines bluegrass, country, and folk into a style she calls "American Primitive". ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Concert review Category:Singer-songwriters from New York (state) Category:American guitarists Category:American drummers Category:Singers from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City Category:American bluegrass musicians Category:Country musicians Category:American folk musicians Category:1967 births Category:Living people
title: Gillian Welch
